setting.value:
In many countries, Sunday is a day of rest, a day of prayer, a day of relaxation; but in the United States, Sunday means one thing above all: [B][COLOR white]NFL FOOTBALL[/COLOR][/B] time!
While live sports might yet not be our strongest suit, there are many addons available to live stream every NFL Football game.
Visit the Following Link for the Best NFL Live Streaming Addons: [B][COLOR white]https://www.tvaddons.ag/nfl-kodi-2016/[/COLOR][/B]
Also, please don't forget to [B][COLOR white]Visit our Sponsors[/COLOR][/B] regularly!
